scripts.meson-install: npm run build && npm run meson-setup && npm run meson-compile && cd mesonbuilddir && meson install
scripts.meson-uninstall: cd mesonbuilddir && ninja uninstall && cd .. && npm run meson-clean
scripts.install-data: sudo mkdir -p /var/lib/obision-status/data/icons && sudo cp data/applications.json /var/lib/obision-status/ && sudo cp -r data/icons/applications /var/lib/obision-status/data/icons/ && sudo cp -r data/icons/categories /var/lib/obision-status/data/icons/
